articles.author: Joe Fedewa
articles.title: How to Disconnect Your Phone Number from RCS on Android - How-To Geek
articles.description: If you have an Android phone, you might have an upgraded version of text messaging called “RCS.” This is a massive upgrade over SMS, but it does come with some baggage. Here’s how to deregister your number from RCS.
